name: Reawaken Demo
description: Travel through Eaclathra, a realm once filled with magic, but now overrun with the minions of the evil wizard Ganimard. Eaclathra's magic had a source known as the Orb of Majesty, now in possession of Ganimard. The Orb has enabled Ganimard to take rule to the land, disrupting the peace and destroying the lives  of many. You must retrieve the Orb to save the land. You are Eaclathra's only hope!
